name: Wrathful Vajra

desc.0: The Vajra with unquenchable rage — surely there's more to their cruelty than this. The warrior as steadfast as a mountain — surely there's more to their purity than this. The ascetic with a heart of flame — surely there's more to their suffering than this.
desc.2: <ct color=#959595>"The craftsman was really fixated on the design of the lion's head... He said all the anger and courage were hidden in those eyes."
desc.3: —Banyue, who can't help but think the W-Engine looks a bit too much like himself.</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: The purging flames burned a hundred times, yet never cleansed me.
